arabic.title: صلوات النبي Salawat un Nabi Medley
text: مولاى صلّ و سلم دائما أبدا
يا ربي بجاه النبي أزح الغمة
يا ربي بجاه النبي أزح الغمة

english.title: Salawat un Nabi Medley
text: O my Master, send your salutations and blessings forever
Upon Your Beloved, the best of the whole of creation)
Oh Prophet, peace be upon you
Send blessings upon the Prophet and smile!
For the Prophet smiled and smiled
O Allah, send Your blessings upon him
It tastes happiness while lost in love
Send salutations upon him, the intercessor of the Muslim nation
By mentioning the messenger we sharpen our zeal
O God, for the sake of the prophet, clear the adversity
like a moon like a moon the radiance of prophet is just like the moon
and how beautiful how beautiful how beautiful is our prophet
Our beloved prophet MUHAMMAD gave us his light as a gift
from mecca his bright light glowing to medinah
he who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
how lucky is he who walks in his shadow
May salutations be sent upon you
May salutations be sent upon you O my Beloved
May salutations be sent upon you
May salutations be sent upon you O my Beloved
O Prophet of Allah, O Messenger of Allah.
